links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,100
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,30, if(!isprime(n), print1(n!, ", ")))(PARI) { n=0; f=1; for (m=1, 200, f*=m; if (!isprime(m), write("b062313.txt", n++, " ", f); if (n==100, break)) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 04 2009
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 05 2001
